name: Pong (itch) (Si-ja)
description:
Description:

A simple Pong style game, with a retro theme. The catch is that this version has several achievements that you can collect. Can you figure out what they are and get all of them? Good luck!

How to play:

> Move the paddle with UP and DOWN arrow keys.

> Navigate in the menu with the MOUSE.

> Pause the game by pressing SPACE during gameplay.
